sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { StatusBar } from 'expo-status-bar';
import {  } from 'react-native';
import { Container, Content, SquaresContainer, Square, Lab, ExitContainer, ExitContent,
   DuoIcon, DuoLab } from "./styles/home";
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-native-fontawesome'
import { faRightFromBracket, faUsers, faUserTie, faCommentsDollar,
faMobileScreenButton, faCoins, faCartShopping, faPlus } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";


function Home({ navigation }) {
    return (
        <Container>
          <StatusBar backgroundColor="#677689"/>
          <Content>
          <SquaresContainer>
          <Square onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Preco')}>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faCommentsDollar} size={ 100 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            <Lab> Pre√ßos </Lab>
          </Square>          
          <Square onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Cliente')}>           
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faUsers} size={ 100 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            <Lab> Clientes </Lab>         
          </Square>
          </SquaresContainer>

          <SquaresContainer>
          <Square>
            <DuoIcon>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faUserTie} size={ 80 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faMobileScreenButton} size={ 40 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            </DuoIcon>
            <DuoLab> Atendimento </DuoLab>       
          </Square>
          <Square>
            <DuoIcon>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faCartShopping} size={ 80 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faCoins} size={ 40 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            </DuoIcon>
            <DuoLab> Vendas </DuoLab>        
          </Square>
          </SquaresContainer>

          <SquaresContainer>
          <Square>
          <DuoIcon>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faCartShopping} size={ 80 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faPlus} size={ 40 } color={ '#a5acb6' }/>
            </DuoIcon>        
            <DuoLab> Reabertura </DuoLab>      
          </Square>
          </SquaresContainer>

          </Content>

          <ExitContainer>
            <ExitContent onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Login')}>             
            <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faRightFromBracket} size={ 52 } color={ '#677689' }/>
            </ExitContent>
          </ExitContainer>
        </Container>
    );
  };

  export default Home;
